channel.title: Perception on 思算
channel.description: Recent content in Perception on 思算

item.title: Efficient coding explains the universal law of generalization in human perception
item.description: {: .imgright width=“300px”} This week’s code breaking focuses on understanding the codes that accompany the paper Efficient coding explains the universal law of generalization in human perception, and the original code is hosted here at Open Science Framework. My analysis and Python-transformation are here at Github
